entry.data:
AREAS OF FOG THIS MORNING
PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH, BECOMING WEST IN THE AFTERNOON
GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
MUCH COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHEAST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE LOWER 40S IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
MUCH COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
